item.title: How surveillance technology and the 'Reddit Detective Agency' helped search for a killer
item.description: More than a decade ago, a frenzied 5-day search for the Boston Marathon bombers left some lessons in its aftermath

item.title: 3 officers wounded and suspect killed after domestic violence call in New York
item.description: Three police officers responding to a domestic violence call have been wounded, and a suspect killed in Rochester, New York
